TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you are killed in the process of killing them.

I wish that I could make some of my own R-Candy.

Granted. It does not work. At all.

(It literally does nothing)

I wish for 420 ICBMs. With nuclear payload.

(And all the standard security and that... only I can launch, no exploding randomly!)

The icbms start to malfunction and start firing and blow up ONLY your house

I wish that some thing random will happen

Granted. Something happens. It was random, but you don't realize that it was random.

I wish for a nice dessert.

Brownies magically appear in your oven. You are away from home.

Your oven burns your house down.

I wish for texturing skills!

You get the texturing skills. Your coding skills are taken away from you, and so is all knowledge about Unity or similar.

So you can texture, but it will never show up inside any game since you do not know how. Enjoy your 2D drawings that are useless!

I wish I could code.

Granted, only in a useless, outdated code.

I wish that I could have some good rep.

Granted. you get so many rep,that the forum software implemented destroys the whole forum.

I wish for to be faster than the speed of sound.

Granted. As you run, your body tears apart from the forces and the heat friction of traveling faster than the speed of sound on the ground. Also, your shoes are untied, thus you supersonically trip and skim your knee. Ow.

I wish for an A in Chemistry.

Granted, but another grade drops to an F.

I wish to fly!

Granted, you get turned into a flying fish.

I wish people didn't hate Google+.

Granted, people are now mindless robots all connected to each other via wi-fi!

I wish for a zimbabwean dollar.

Granted. You get arrested for forgery by method of wish granting.

I wish for humans to be mindless robots all connected to each other via wi-fi.

granted, everyone loves Google+.

I wish for a fish... (sorry, can't think of anything atm)

Granted! *Throws you off a boat*

I wish for another rep bar.

Granted. The standard for entry into the Light Green Group is raised to three light bars, though.

I wish for all reputation on the forum to be zeroed.

Granted. Here's the deed to the Bar of Representatives.

I wish for the people of earth to forget about the day-night cycle.

Granted, people have forgotten about it because it has been so long since there was a day-night cycle. The Earth has been stationary for a loooooong time.

I wish people would stop buying tiny dogs, and buy huskies or German shepherds instead!

Granted. It's only a matter of time until the dogs evolve into megabeasts, rulers of the world.

I wish for equilibrium to be easier.

Granted, but you don't ever know that it is.

I wish I knew (the order of) 500 consecutive digits past the decimal of pi.

Since computers know more than 2 million digits, you are now a computer.

Con: Sentient computers have not been invented yet. (Can't upgrade an old one either!)

I wish the RAM limit was removed.

Granted, but now it takes so much ram that it kills your computer just to start the game.

I wish that the Kraken (KSP one) didn't exist.

Granted. It's now a space horse that bucks your ships into oblivion.

I wish that fish.

Granted. a MILLION fishs fall on you.

I wish for to have a private pirate ship.

Granted, the crew kills you.

Wish: I wish for my wish to not be granted
